channel.title: scene on Chinmay's Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in scene on Chinmay's Data Science Portfolio

item.title: Project I: Housing Prices Project
item.description: Housing Prices Project Housing Prices Project Competition Description: Ask a home buyer to describe their dream house, and they probably won’t begin with the height of the basement ceiling or the proximity to an east-west railroad. But this playground competition’s dataset proves that much more influences price negotiations than the number of bedrooms or a white-picket fence. With 79 explanatory variables describing (almost) every aspect of residential homes in Ames, Iowa, this competition challenges you to predict the final price of each home.
